```{r}
ggplot2::qplot(Sepal.Length, data = iris, geom = "histogram")

library(ggplot2)

ggplot(iris) +
  aes(Sepal.Length) +
  geom_histogram()

```

```{r}
library(GGally)

iris |> 
 ggpairs(aes(color = Species)) + 
  theme_minimal() +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Purples", aesthetics = c("color", "fill"))
```
